rows.label: tlk70000024_05_msg0001
rows.name:
If Ryuuryuu honest, did not
like friends much at first.

rows.label: tlk70000024_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Strangers dare attack base
of brave Nopon?! That is
what Ryuuryuu thought.

rows.label: tlk70000024_05_msg0003
rows.name:
But now, knight and friends have
saved town. Great deed, yes!

rows.label: tlk70000024_05_msg0004
rows.name:
If Ryuuryuu and brotherpons
had not met friends, would
still be no-good loafers.

rows.label: tlk70000024_05_msg0005
rows.name:
Ryuuryuu full of admiration!
Want to be like friends!

rows.label: tlk70000024_05_msg0006
rows.name:
Friends can definitely defeat
Grail with no sweat! Positive.

rows.label: tlk70000024_05_msg0007
rows.name:
Mo! Ryuuryuu rambling. If
other Muskerpons hear, they
laugh like crackbrain Tirkin!
